name: Diaspo
slogan: Authentic cooking experiences with the generation that knows best
description:
We are starting with authentic cooking experiences in the kitchen of the teacher or the learner. We exist to help older adults increase their well-being, meaning and give them a sense of purpose by providing them with the opportunity to share their knowledge and skills.

For the learner, we are providing the most authentic cooking experience. More than just the food, you learn about the stories, traditions and people behind it.

jobs.title: Content Creator Intern (Foodie)
jobs.description:
Do you want to part of a social impact tech start-up? Do you want to help older adults in a time when they need it most.

We are an early stage online platform that connections generations through food,  and we are looking for bright & intelligent interns to help in content writing across food and culture.

You will be working for a fast-paced start-up and closely with the CEO. You will gain expertise across all lines of business and you will be exposed to all aspects of start-up life.

You'll be working for a fast-paced tech start-up, working closely with the CEO with great mentorship opportunities. Our role will include:

• Writing content on a range of food topics
• Arrange interviews with older adults about their family recipes
• Creating visually appealing food content
• Writing content on culture events and traditions
• Responsible for managing our social media channels (Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and others)

You will have:

Strong writing skills
Strong photoshop skills
Align with our vision to connect generations through culture
Passionate about food
Proactive attitude

Benefits
Free, private cooking experiences
(Offices in Liverpool St)
Opportunity to develop into a full-time paid role
Constant support, mentorship and guidance
